Desc.entry: Brian Smith offers watercolour painting courses for beginners and improvers wishing to develop technique and build confidence. Also runs workshops for art groups and painting demonstrations. Delivers art and design programmes through residencies to primary and secondary schools (within a 30 mile radius of Sheffield). Programmes meet requirements of the National Curriculum. CRB checked.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 9.30am-12noon, 7-9.30pm (painting classes - advanced booking only, please see website for course start dates). Workshops and residencies by arrangement
